channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Redwood Materials preps for expansion spree with new R&D center in San Francisco
item.description: Redwood Materials has been on an expansion tear in recent years — growth that has extended the lithium-ion battery recycling and materials startup’s f...

item.title: Sony’s Latest Bravia Home Theater Gear Gets Bolder, Brighter
item.description: We went hands-on with Sony’s latest home theater gear, including its fiery new OLED TV.

item.title: DeepMind’s 145-page paper on AGI safety may not convince skeptics
item.description: Google DeepMind on Wednesday published an exhaustive paper on its safety approach to AGI, roughly defined as AI that can accomplish any task a human c...

item.title: This Tool Probes Frontier AI Models for Lapses in Intelligence
item.description: A new platform from data training company Scale AI will let artificial intelligence developers find their models’ weak spots.

item.title: Epic Games acquires Loci to introduce automated 3D tagging
item.description: Epic Games announced on Wednesday the acquisition of Loci, an AI platform for automated tagging 3D assets. The deal will help creators with the labor-...

item.title: Cybersecurity Professor Faced China Funding Inquiry Before Disappearing, Sources Say

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Is Coming June 5 for $450
item.description: Nintendo's next-generation handheld is set to launch June 5 alongside a slew of new games and accessories—including one very cool rebooted GameCube co...

item.title: What to know about TikTok’s uncertain future in the US and the people who want to buy it

item.title: The Best Mushroom Coffee, WIRED Tested and Reviewed (2025)

item.title: Amazon reportedly submits last-minute bid to acquire TikTok
item.description: Amazon has submitted a bid to acquire all of TikTok, according to a new report from The New York Times. The last-minute bid comes as TikTok faces an A...
